峇峇峇

峇字的基本解释

峇
kè
〔岌（
山洞。j?）峇〕锤铁声。

峇
bā
〔峇厘〕印度尼西亚岛名的旧译，今通作“巴厘”。

峇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kè］
［《集韻》渴合切，入合，溪。］
见“岌峇”。
[②]［bā］
译名用字。峇厘，印度尼西亚岛名，现译作巴厘。

峇字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　峇； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页310第09
【集韻】渴合切，音溘。山形。【正字通】山窟也。一說同峆。

峇字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
峇字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Ba
kè
〔perilous(
Cave. j?) Ba] the sound of hammering.
Ba
bā
[Bali] The old translation of the Indonesian island name is now known as "Bali".
Ba
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kè］
["Jiyun" is thirsty and cut, enters, and creek. ]
See "Kaba".
[②]［bā］
Translated names with words. Bali, the name of the Indonesian island, is now translated as Bali.
Ba
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji] [Mountain Character Department] 　峇; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: Page 310 09
【Jiyun】Thirst and eagerness, with sound. Yamagata. [Zhengzitong] Mountain cave also. One said the same 峆.
